summary: After a vicious attack leaves him brain-damaged and broke, Mark Hogancamp seeks recovery in "Marwencol", a 1/6th scale World War II-era town he creates in his backyard.
cast: Mark Hogancamp|Emmanuel Nneji|Edda Hogancamp|Tom Neubauer|Julie Swarthout|Janet Wikane|Mark Wikane|Bert|Lisa Bruck|Colleen Vargo|David Naugle|Ruthie Hotaling|Tod Lippy
title: Marwencol
